meanings.sent1: She redos her homework to make sure it is perfect.
meanings.sent2: He always redos his speech before presenting it to the class.
meanings.sent3: The teacher joked that she would need to redos the lesson because the students were so confused.
meanings.sent4: Watching the chef redos the dish multiple times, I realized the importance of practice.
meanings.sent5: The athlete redos his training routine every day to improve his performance.

meanings.sent1: The singer's redos of the song were all amazing.
meanings.sent2: After several redos, the artist finally perfected the painting.
meanings.sent3: The actor's redos of the scene made the audience burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The student's redos of the experiment showed a clear improvement in results.
meanings.sent5: The team's redos of the play helped them win the game.
